mapper.update: update user set password = #{password} where username = #{username};
mapper.select: SELECT user.username,user.name,user.age,user.sex,user.tel,user.doid, doctor.title,doctor.brief,doctor.point,doctor.did,doctor.hid,doctor.hours_practice,doctor.excel FROM user JOIN doctor ON user.doid = doctor.id JOIN concern on user.id = concern.uiid where concern.uid = #{uid} and user.doid is not null;
